page.title: 05Land Usage
page.content: The land is very heavily used for {farming}and this is borne out by statistics.In a count of one hundred areas of land 94 were used for{ {farming}purposes,one for{recreation and one for deciduous woodland.The type of{farming}carried out is very intensive,one crop replacing another on a strict rotational basis.The fields do not stay bare for any length of time.No land is wasted as crops are grown right up to the very edge of roads and hedges etc.Because of this there is a need to keep the fields fertilized and a combination of manure and artificial fertilizer is used for this purpose.Some of the chemical fertilizer has to be applied by crop spraying aeroplane and this is of special concern for those people connected with the{ecology}of the area.
